QuestData.Title: Shut it Down
QuestData.Description: I mussed up. Bad.$B$BIt's hard work cutting seeds out of kafa berries! But I noticed goots eat the berries up and give back the seeds... in a day or so.$B$BI fed everything I had to the goots on Kota Peak and now they're nuts! Chargin' everything that moves.$B$BKota used to be safe for Grummles to gather kafa. Not anymore. Not with them goots. Will you help?
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 Kafa-Crazed Mountain Goats on Kota Peak.
QuestData.CompletionText: I shoulda never fed them goots.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, friend. Let this be a lesson to you: never feed the goots.
